segments.text: Did you make it to school today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I always do . Did you go to school today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should have , but have you seen any movies lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was an odd change of subject .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe it was , but answer the question .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to go to see a movie this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to go alone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , will you be at school tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I want to go to the movies instead .
segments.speaker: S2
